name: Trollge: Desire to Kill
description:
You can fight 5 different and unique bosses in each map, they all have different abilities!

Your desire to kill and revenge overwhelmingly high, you need to somehow cool it down... SO LET'S KILL SOME PEOPLE!!

You are playing as a Trollge creature with a weapon in your hands, on your left and your right there are storms of Cereal Enjoyers (Cereal Guy's) and sniper scopes everywhere trying to take you down with brute force.

Trollface is owned by Carlos Ramirez

This game is created by Dopey Incidents Productions

This game falls under Fair-Use and is Non-Profit, we do not get any money from this game.
